comments.body: document the meaning of `container==""` in the interface godoc here
Lets include Millis in the name of the metrics. It is not obvious from the method name that it returns the value in millis. Here and elsewhere. Can be next PR.
Ok, I'll do it in a PR later on (it's just a naming change, no functional impact).

i am still parsing through, and this could be handled in any later refactor, but is there a reason we didnt have:

`client.Metrics(namespace).GetResourceMetric(resource, selector)`

as the API pattern?
There's no particular reason, just that I didn't want to add a new implementation and refactor the existing interface at the same time.
I'll post a follow-on PR at a later date
